trends: There has been one other sighting in Skopje
There were no other sightings in Skopje on or around December 8th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 20:00 and i wanted to watch the moon with my telescope i noticed a white orb next to the moon I thought it was Venus but it was bigger.I knew something is not right about it and than after several minutes it started fading and it was gone only black sky on the place where it was standing.I noticed the same thing 3 days after that again near the moon and it just faded again I never saw it again.i felt really interested about it i was just watching it and forgot to picture it and i am feeling sad now because i did not took a picture of it.
